document.full_text: as protesters celebrated the departure of yemen's president, who was evacuated to saudi arabi for medical treatment, fireworks filled the sky over the protest camp in the capital, sana.
document.title: the lede: fireworks in yemen's 'change square'
lines_and_colors: as protesters celebrated the departure of yemen's president, who was evacuated to saudi arabi for medical treatment, fireworks filled the sky over the protest camp in the capital, sana.
